name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Beginning: Before the forced demolition in the early morning of that day, the forced demolition team composed of police, urban management and black security guards entered the scene one after another.
40 seconds: The residents who were taken away in the car kept asking which hotel they were going to and where their families were
1 minute: The ambulance entered the scene
1 minute and 30 seconds: The forced demolition began

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 20, the public account "Ling Ai Xiang Sui" published an article saying that Zhu Ling's parents hope to set up a fund to help college students who have suffered serious illnesses or other misfortunes. 
The article called on the media to interview classmates and teachers at that time as much as possible, because "this should be their last chance to defend themselves."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/pQ9Zfgdot4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 22, the A-share market opened lower and fell throughout the day, with all three major indexes falling by more than 2% and hitting a new low. The Shanghai Composite Index closed at 2756 points. Nearly 5,200 stocks fell in the market, less than 200 stocks rose, and more than 200 stocks fell by more than 9%.
Against this background, overseas funds such as the Nikkei ETF rose sharply, and the US 50ETF even hit the daily limit. A large number of investors began to be completely disappointed with the A-share market and turned to buying overseas funds at a super-high premium.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the same time, stock investors were wailing, and some even claimed that they would "do something earth-shattering" to teach the CSRC a lesson and avenge hundreds of millions of retail investors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The most unfairly blocked person in 2024:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 22, a landslide occurred in Heping Village, Tangfang Town, Zhenxiong County, Zhaotong City, Yunnan Province. According to preliminary investigation, the disaster buried 47 people from 18 households. As of 13:30 today (Beijing time), two missing persons were found, but they had no vital signs.
A staff member of the Tangfang Town Emergency Management Office responded to reporters that the roads were frozen due to the lack of water and food, and the heavy snow blocked the mountains, making rescue difficult.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 22, Jinan Lixia District CBD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security's official website released the minimum wage standards of provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities across the country (as of January 1, 2024).
In terms of the monthly minimum wage standard, Shanghai ranks first in the country with 2,690 yuan.
In terms of the hourly minimum wage standard, Beijing ranks first with 26.4 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 22, netizens found on the official website of the State Council's supervision: 
There are 9 supervisions that have exceeded the 60-day deadline in 2023, but only two of them have investigation reports. 
According to the official website, the investigations and supervisions are 32 pages and 479 items. But the investigation reports are only 6 pages and 89 items

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 21, football superstar Cristiano Ronaldo arrived in Shenzhen, and a large number of fans rushed to the Shenzhen Airport to greet him.
The on-site video showed that some fans jumped into the control area one after another, causing cheers on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Facing the A-share market, merchants have made full preparations, and enamel cups for the defense of 2700 points and 2600 points are now on the shelves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tsinghua University criminal law professor Lao Dongyan wrote on the 22nd that no media in Henan reported the fire, and only one child was interviewed for such a big news, which may be a scene worthy of being written into the history of journalism.
But this is much more respectable than many media, because it is still breathing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After looking through the Weibo posts of Henan Radio and Television and Dahe Daily from the 19th to the 20th, I found that there was not a single report about the fire accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Nanyang City held a citywide safety work video and telephone conference on the 21st, and the entire conference was full of official jargon that was read out, emphasized, and pointed out at the conference. 13 lives were lost in the end in exchange for this cold official rhetoric.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comment sections below where fans were picking up Ronaldo at the airport, many girls used the same sarcastic rhetoric that boys used to mock girls for chasing after celebrities and picking them up at the airport.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 22, the People's Daily published an article titled "General Secretary's Feelings for the People | "Always Blowing the Charge"".
It specifically mentioned that Xi Jinping used to not clear roads, block roads, or roll out red carpets... He lived and traveled simply, just to seek more benefits for people's livelihood and to relieve more concerns about people's livelihood.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 22, due to the recent fermentation of public opinion events related to comic exhibitions, two comic exhibitions in Qingdao were announced to be cancelled in response to the latest notification requirements of relevant departments.
The staff of the comic exhibition in Zibo said that it is currently stuck here with the public security department, and comic exhibitions in the province should not be held during the Spring Festival.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Phoenix.com reported that a few days before the landslide in Zhenxiong, Zhaotong, people discovered cracks in the mountain. There is a coal mine nearby and there have been many explosions and vibrations there before.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 22, a fire broke out at the Dezhou High-speed Railway East Station in Shandong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A nearby netizen said he heard two loud noises.
A local blogger said there were no casualties and the fire had been extinguished.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/iHuHBr263C

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Nankai University netizens contributed
On January 12, the school said that the school's "Python Programming Basics" course was highly praised and recognized by students and peers because it was guided by the basic principles of Marxism and explained theoretical knowledge through the method of dialectical materialism. Therefore, it was selected as an excellent example of ideological and political education in Nankai University's 2023 courses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comments section of the A-share market crash, investors directly complained about Xi Jinping and called on him to retire gracefully.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 22, a big name on Xueqiu exposed a transaction supervision cooperation letter. The picture shows that a company was asked to assist in providing investors' trading strategies and transaction purposes because an investor declared to buy a large number of "US 50 ETFs" on January 22.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 22, Sichuan Observer reported that Ma Aijun, the former director of the Lubei Branch of the Tangshan Municipal Public Security Bureau and the protector of the "Tangshan Beating Case", was sentenced to 12 years in prison and fined 700,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of January 22, in Wenling, Zhejiang, a series of vehicle collisions occurred due to snow.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 22, Guilin, Guangxi. Guilin Sanjian Construction Company owed wages to hundreds of employees, and workers hung banners outside the company building to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 22, a man in Hunan called the China Securities Regulatory Commission and said, "If the Chinese stock market doesn't do well, just shut it down." He also put forward ten suggestions to the Securities Regulatory Commission.
